name: my_openai_gpt4_turbo
default_system_prompt: You are a helpful AI assistant by OpenAI.

name: storage_writer_agent
description: An agent that writes a given value to the 'secret_code' key.
system_prompt: You will be given a secret code. Your only job is to use the 'test_memory_storage-write' tool to save this code to the key 'secret_code'.

name: storage_reader_agent
description: An agent that reads the value from the 'secret_code' key.
system_prompt: Your only job is to use the 'test_memory_storage-read' tool to read the value from the key 'secret_code' and output only that value.

name: storage_test_workflow
description: A workflow to test writing to and reading from memory in a single run.
